byline.affiliation: Institute of Plant Biochemistry, Academy of Sciences of the GDR,

front.div:
(±)-[2-l4 C)Jasmonic acid has been synthesized in nearly 50% yield via the route of the Michael
addition starting from 2-(2Z-pentenyl)-2-cyclopenten-l-one and diethyl [2-14 C]malonate followed
by saponification and decarboxylation of the Michael products in one step.
